master

Class BlockNavigator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • master.Navigator
        • master.BlockNavigator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, INavigator

    public class BlockNavigator
extends Navigator
    This is a singleton implementation of a Navigator where the robot will attempt to travel as though in a grid. For example the navigator will break down the path to the destination in terms of number of vertical and horizontal blocks.
    Author:
    alex
